attributes.action: Public Defibulators for One in Two Schools
attributes.additional_details:
As a citizen of the UK I am disheartend to learn of our goverments position in regards to defibulators in Schools, as such I am re listing and calling on the whole of the UK to please sign as we all need each others help. The initial petition was for ALL schools yet rejected, however lets look atleast One Defibulator in every two schools as a comprimise and thus a new E Petition. Lets all send our message clear to those who "represent the will  of the people"
Thank You.
